refnamediv.refpurpose: convert SVC files to FSM format

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The &svc2fsm; tool converts a state space in the SVC format in &infile; to the FSM format and saves the result to &outfile;. If &outfile; is not supplied, stdout is used.

Note that tools that use the FSM format may depend on state information and correct parameter names. The former requires that the state information is in the SVC file and the latter that the -l option is used (supplying the corresponding LPE).
This tool is based on the svc2fsm tool of Huub van de Wetering as found in the muCRL toolset. It has been extended to SVC files generated by &lpe2lts; and to better support new visualisation tools.
